message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY, cs.LG 

The paper focuses on security analysis of mobile applications, specifically Android apps. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper proposes a framework for evaluating static analysis tools, which involves software engineering practices such as testing and debugging, hence it could also be categorized under software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the flaws in the design of existing tools, which relates to programming languages and compilers (cs.PL). The paper proposes a semi-automated framework for evaluating tools, which involves system-level analysis and testing, hence it could also be categorized under systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to analyze the results of the evaluation, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
